name: Asociación Española de Fitosanitarios y Sanidad Ambiental
membership: AEFISA is member of the Catalan Business Federation of the Chemical Sector (FEDEQUIM-Federación Empresarial Catalana del Sector Químico).
goal: AEFISA is an SME's association representing 14 national companies in Spain, involved in the plant protection sector and placing plant protection products in the UE market (mainly in southern and central zones).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
AEFISA is involved with different issues including:
Plant Protection Products, Biocides, Fertilisers, Biostimulants, Plant Health, Human Health, Environmental issues, Chemical industry issues (such as REACH, CLP, BREF, Stockolm and Rotterdam Conventions, etc.).
